mapper.insert: insert into QUESTIONS (U_ID, P_ID, QTITLE, QCONTENT, QTYPE, QCREATED_TIME, QMODIFIED_TIME, IS_ANSWERED) values (#{u_id}, #{p_id}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, #{qtype}, systimestamp, systimestamp, 0)
mapper.select: select * from QUESTIONS where QTYPE IN ('배송', '재입고', '기타 상품문의') order by ID desc
